name: HighWind (itch)
description:
HighWind is a short, randomly generated adventure game where the player must race against the clock, activate beacons and collect treasure!

If the boats fuel runs out before you can activate 3 beacons and collect 20 pieces of treasure, then its game over for you!

EXPLORE THE OCEAN! Explore an ocean that continuously loops on itself during your search for your goal!
